page.title: 06ANGLO AQUARIUM PLANT CO LTD
page.content: Anglo Aquarium occupy a 1.5 acre site in Cattlegate Road,Enfield.150 types of aquatic plants are grown for ponds and aquariums mostly from seeds. Special sterilised compost is used, steamed to reduce the weeds.Plants are grown indoors and outside in ponds and glasshouses.Sprays of warm water are used to water the beds.Most of the plants need special lighting.Special equipment includes soil potting machines and tractors.On average 20 people are employed to do growing, packing and office work.The busiest time is Spring. Anglo Aquarium do not sell to the public,only to retail outlets such as Garden Centres or pet shops.Plant pots aquariums,mussels and snails are also sold.The rarest plant they have is called Charles de Meurville, and the commonest is Lobelia Cardinalis.
